DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy brexpiprazole ( flexible dose ) placebo adjunctive therapy assign open label antidepressant therapy ( ADT ) propose subject population MDD .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Flexible-dose Brexpiprazole Adjunctive Therapy Treatment Adults With Major Depressive Disorder , Delphinus Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This trial design assess safety efficacy brexpiprazole ( flexible dose ) adjunctive therapy assign know anti-depressant depressed subject . The trial consist continuous 18-week double-blind treatment period 30-day follow-up . Subjects complete trial visit Week 18 visit may offer entry optional open-label rollover trial .
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient 18 65 year age , inclusive , time informed consent . Subjects diagnosis MDD , current major depressive episode , define DSMIVTR criterion Subjects willing discontinue prohibit psychotropic medication meet protocolrequired washout prior trial period . Females breastfeed and/or positive pregnancy test result screen prior receive trial medication Subject current Axis I ( DSMIVTR ) diagnosis : dementia , Schizophrenia , Bipolar , Eating disorder , Obsessivecompulsive disorder , Panic disorder , Posttraumatic stress disorder Subjects experience hallucination , delusion psychotic symptomatology current major depressive episode . Subjects meet DSMIVTR criterion substance abuse dependence within past 180 day Subjects currently treat insulin diabetes . Subjects uncontrolled hypertension Subjects know ischemic heart disease history myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure , angioplasty , stenting , coronary artery bypass Surgery Subjects positive drug screen cocaine , marijuana , illicit drug Inability swallow tablet tolerate oral medication Abnormal laboratory test result , vital sign ECG result Subjects previously participate prior brexpiprazole clinical trial .
